=== UniMRCP client ===
  * [http://www.freeswitch.org FreeSWITCH] is an open source telephony platform. It provides an abstract interface for the integration of ASR/TTS engines. Module, which utilizes UniMRCP client stack (mod_unimrcp), allows FreeSWITCH to connect to MRCP compliant servers.
